description.@en: You perform both the rites required to usher along the dead, but also a special convocation to prevent them from being raised from the dead.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch (providing that they are already Slain!) cannot be raised from the dead by Magickal or supernatural means. This can only be cast upon a corpse once, regardless of whether it succeeds or fails.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but this Magick lasts for triple the Duration.

criticalFailure.@en: From the moment that the body is laid to rest, your dreams are haunted by the deceasedâ€™s memories. For three nights hence, your Peril Condition Track may only recover to Imperiled as if you were resting in an unsafe place (as noted in Chapter 9: Hazards(Not Currently in the Compendium)).

reagents.@en: A brick, set between the teeth (expended)

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
